activities: As a payment gateway, we securely collect customer information including name, address, and credit card number in order to process payments for purchases of goods and services from merchants using our service. These customers include people from the EU and Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer name, address, payment method, and purchase information.
recoursemech:
We've engaged The DMA for Safe Harbor issue resolution.
